name: Robot Roll-Out
description:
Weekly Game Jam 158

Theme: Replay

Get the robots to the end of the level!

Controls
  • Arrows - move
  • Space - Jump
  • Left shift - Replay
  • C - Free cam mode
    •  Mouse - Move free cam
    • C - Exit free cam
  • R - reset level
  • Esc - Pause game
Developers
